name: LeptospirosisTestsForLeptospiraNucleicAcid
title: Leptospirosis (Tests for Leptospira Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Leptospira nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Leptospira Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
